name: Overtime Overheat
description:
Overtime Overheat

Game made for https://itch.io/jam/vimjam2.

Normal office day, kinda boring, so you go smoke a fast one while the boss is not looking. Everything suddenly becomes more interesting, but also more challenging. Hopefully noone asks you to do an easy task, like repairing a microwave.

Controls:

Wasd/arrows/Left Analog  - move

Left Mouse/Right Analog - shoot

Right Mouse/Right Trigger - shoot rocket

Space/Shift/Left Trigger - dash

Music by Hellsnake

Everything else by Arcy

Assets used:

Models: 

- "Heavy Assault Rifle" (https://skfb.ly/6RRET) by valerij1987

- "Microwave Oven" (https://skfb.ly/6RrWD) by aqpetteri

Unity Assets:

- Skinner by Keijiro

- Living Particles by SineVFX

Powered with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.

Linux and Mac versions are untested and may require giving execution perms!
Example on Mac: chmod -R 755 /Path/to/BuildMac.app
